items.sentence: I can't afford a new car, so I'll have to make this one do.
She had already gone to bed when I phoned her at 11:00 p.m.
I've been invited on a trip abroad, but I don't want to go.
I'll get even with you, if it takes me the rest of my life.
Tom wishes that he could speak French as well as Mary does.
Tom wished that he could tell Mary about what had happened.
I heard our new French teacher just graduated from college.
Tom needs to make sure that he's done everything correctly.
Tom invested his money in the stock market and became rich.
It doesn't matter to me whether you open the window or not.
It was quiet. Of course, it didn't stay that way very long.
Speaking of Boston, have you ever been there in the winter?
Tom said it was more difficult to do that than he expected.
Could you do me a favor and close the door on your way out?
I want to know whether you plan to come to my party or not.
Which of these books would you recommend that I read first?
Your sister is much younger than you, but you look younger.
It's normal for wounds to itch. That means they're healing.
Even though I'm better at French, I'd rather speak English.
You aren't the only one who's not able to do that, are you?
